20  public function __construct($selector="[data-field]",$event="dblclick",$hasButtons=true,$hasPopup=false,$updateCallback="",$identifierSelector="$(this).closest('tr').attr('data-ajax')"){
21  $this->selector=$selector;
22  $this->event=$event;
23  $this->hasButtons=$hasButtons;
24  $this->hasPopup=$hasPopup;
25  $this->updateCallback=$updateCallback;
26  $this->identifierSelector=$identifierSelector;
27  }
28 
29  private function getJsCallbackForEditMember(){
30  if($this->hasPopup){
31  return "$(self).popup({hideOnScroll: false,exclusive: true,delay:{show:50,hide: 5000},closable: false, variation: 'very wide',html: data, hoverable: true,className: {popup: 'ui popup'}}).popup('show');";
32  }else{
33  return "$(self).html(function(i,v){return $(this).data('originalText', v), '';});";
34  }
35  }

128  public function compile($baseRoute,JsUtils $jquery,$part=null){
129  $part=(isset($part))?", part: '".$part."'":"";
130  $jsCallback=$this->getJsCallbackForEditMember();
131  $element=null;
132  if(!$this->hasPopup){
133  $element="\$(self)";
134  $before=$jsCallback;
135  $jsCallback="";
136  }else{
137  $before="";
138  }
139  $jquery->postOn($this->event,$this->selector, $baseRoute."/editMember/","{id: ".$this->identifierSelector.",td:$(this).attr('id')".$part."}",$element,["attr"=>"data-field","hasLoader"=>false,"jqueryDone"=>"html","before"=>"$('._memberForm').trigger('endEdit');".$before,"jsCallback"=>$jsCallback]);
140 
141  }
